Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Milestones.Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS
REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS

Title: Relates to the transport or delivery of wine pursuant to a farm distillery license
Summary: Permits the transport or delivery of wine pursuant to a farm winery license in a vehicle owned by an employee of the licensee.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the alcoholic beverage control law, in relation to delivery or transport of wine pursuant to a farm winery license
